name: Wipts
description:
Build towers to hold off the enemies! 

Work in Progress Title Screen is a tower defense where you build and combine different parts to make cannons (and some not-cannons) to defeat enemies with different move patterns. However, towers are limited, so you have to move them from time to time in order to cover enemies from all angles. Made during the University of Washington Game Development Club's retro themed game jam in Autumn 2019.  Can also be purchased in the bundle (Not available yet)!

Controls:

  • A&D / Left & Right Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Left Mouse / Space: Shoot
  • Hold Right Mouse / Left Shift while moving: Pull object opposite from the direction you're moving in
